stories.storyName: As a developer, I want to integrate automated testing into my workflow to ensure code reliability.
As a project manager, I want a task prioritization feature to manage team workloads effectively.
As a user, I want to receive email notifications for important updates and announcements.
As a developer, I want to create a dynamic calendar component that displays upcoming classes and links to detailed pages for each class, so that trainers can easily manage and showcase their courses.
As a project manager, I want to conduct a thorough code review for the dynamic calendar component to ensure its quality and adherence to coding standards before deployment
As a designer, I want to create an eye-catching user interface for the dynamic calendar component, ensuring it is visually appealing and user-friendly
As a QA tester, I want to thoroughly test the dynamic calendar component, ensuring it works flawlessly across different devices and browsers.
As a project manager, I want to prioritize the implementation of the dynamic calendar component, ensuring it is delivered on time and aligns with the overall project goals.
As a marketing specialist, I want to create promotional materials and campaigns to highlight the new dynamic calendar feature, attracting more trainers and attendees to the platform.
As a product manager, I want to gather feedback from trainers and attendees regarding the dynamic calendar component, in order to identify potential improvements and enhancements.
As a tester, I want to conduct thorough testing and ensure all features of the dynamic calendar component work as expected across different devices and browsers.
As a developer, I want to implement a search functionality within the dynamic calendar component, so that trainers and attendees can easily find specific classes based on keywords.
